channel.title: Portapps

item.title: Terminus portable 1.0.122-2
item.description:
A new Portapps app has been added to the collection!
Terminus is a terminal for a more modern age.
You can download this first release of Terminus portable 1.0.122-2 on the Terminus portable page.
